item.title: The Technicalities of Writing a Paper for OOPSLA with Emacs and Zotero
item.description: In the spring of 2021, I submitted a paper to the 2021 OOPSLA conference. These are my notes on how to use Emacs and Zotero to put together a technical paper, complete with bibliography, for the OOPSLA conference. Mostly this functions as notes for myself.
